statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND mechanic_id = 101;
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE vehicle_id = 1001 AND maintenance_date < '2022-03-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_maintenance_schedule WHERE mechanic_id IN (SELECT mechanic_id FROM maintenance_history WHERE cost > 500);
DELETE FROM Vehicle WHERE year < 2010 AND manufacturer = 'Toyota';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' AND schedule_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND technician = 'John Doe';
